meanings.sent1: She epigrammatizes her thoughts into short, witty poems.
meanings.sent2: He epigrammatizes his feelings into clever one-liners.
meanings.sent3: The comedian epigrammatizes the news in his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent4: Her pen epigrammatizes life's complexities with sharp precision.
meanings.sent5: The writer's mind epigrammatizes the world into bite-sized truths.

meanings.definition: To express in a concise, clever, and witty manner.
meanings.sent1: He epigrammatizes his jokes to make them more amusing.
meanings.sent2: She epigrammatizes her stories to captivate her audience.
meanings.sent3: The student epigrammatizes his excuses to avoid trouble.
meanings.sent4: Their banter epigrammatizes the essence of friendship.
meanings.sent5: The poet's words epigrammatize the beauty of nature in a few lines.
